original_title: 仮面ライダーエグゼイド [裏技] 仮面ライダーゲンム
overview: Were the battles in Kamen Rider Heisei Generations just a prelude? With new Pac Adventure Gashat, as well as with power of Drive, Gaim, Wizard and other Legend Rider Gashats, Kamen Rider Genm sets a forbidden Battle Game... Can you clear it with no continues?
title: Kamen Rider Ex-Aid [Tricks]: Kamen Rider Genm
